channel.title: Hello, please could somone give me the command to ::mute (playername)!
channel.description: Hello what's going on, well i need some help here please as i've been running my server there has been people playing up, but i don't want to ban u would like to mute them XD, so please could i have the command do ::mute (Playername) and ::unmute (Playername) Thanks. Mod Kay.

item.title: Hello, please could somone give me the command to ::mute (playername)!
item.dc:creator: @mod_kay mod kay
item.description:
@mod_kay wrote:

Thanks alot!! You have helped me 3 times now!! thanks pal!!! XD[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 31, 2008, 07:56:27 PM[/size][hr]Ummm, how do i Unmute somone?

Read full topic

item.title: Hello, please could somone give me the command to ::mute (playername)!
item.dc:creator: @vic_08 Vic_
item.description:
@vic_08 wrote:

[quote=“hah bah gee, post:2, topic:195005”]once again for all you people that keep asking for commands…

download my server hbg-scape or another czar based server as it will have most commands added, I used mine as example because I have mute, unmute, ban, unban, goup, godown, etc…[/quote]

I love your source lol

Its my current one, i like the ::unban its so much easier…
and ipban works great

Your version 2 was really lame though… its was the same thing lol
but oh well

Thanks! and good luck

Read full topic
